channel.title: 508 Client help
channel.description: Ok so i have my java set up fine and everything so i dont have the problem with is stopping at "updating server" or whatever. but anyway when i start my source ( im using blaze scape 508) it says "starting server on port: 43594" and then under that it says "maxlistedNPCS size is too low". can anyone help me fix this? also once i start the server and then i start the client the client now stops at "starting 3d library" please help :( :( :(

item.title: 508 Client help
item.dc:creator: @g_player6 g player6
item.description:
@g_player6 wrote:

Ok so i have my java set up fine and everything so i dont have the problem with is stopping at “updating server” or whatever. but anyway when i start my source ( im using blaze scape 508) it says “starting server on port: 43594” and then under that it says “maxlistedNPCS size is too low”. can anyone help me fix this? also once i start the server and then i start the client the client now stops at “starting 3d library” please help
